Name: Doctor No. 4
Ingredients: 40 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
4 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Retitled 'Swedish Daiquiri', this could be a hit. Aged rum (originally Jamaican rum) combines with tangy Swedish Punch balanced by lime juice. This cocktail loves dilution, so consider adding a splash of water or, perhaps better, serve on-the-rocks.
History: Recipe adapted from Lucius Beebe's 1946 The Stock Club Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Doctor No. 4 contains 202 calories
